New Records: Cooper Criswell pitched 4 perfect innings for the Red Sox before being removed from the game
Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a go-ahead two-run homer on a hanging curveball by Rich Hill
Zack Kelly gave up a two-run homer to Riley Greene in the sixth
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Alex Cora stated that they had a big pocket of lefties and decided to bring in lefty Rich Hill to start the bottom of the fifth inning
Cooper Criswell was cruising and had a sharp five-pitch arsenal, including a new slider
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora said that the loss was on him and that he has to do better
Cooper Criswell stood by his manager and said that he understood the decision to bring in Rich Hill
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox are 4 1/2 games back in the AL Wild Card standings
Boston's starters have been brilliant in a week-long run
The Red Sox are struggling mightily at the plate over the last 10 games with a batting average of.205/.246/.357
